byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi and Sharifullah Sahak contributed reporting from Kabul, and an employee of The New York Times from southeastern Afghanistan.

snippet: Beatings and torture have long been part of the local detention culture, especially for the intelligence service, which is under pressure to get confessions so that cases can proceed to rapid trials.
